1553356909.name: Arroz con pollo
1553356909.preparation:
This is an individual exercise. However, you will be giving feedback to the other members of your peer code-review group on the solutions they present, as well as receiving feedback from them.
Create a public repo in your Github profile. This project should be part of your personal portfolio.

1553363477.name: Caramelos de cianuro
1553363477.preparation:
The :name is a parameter in the URL, in the example it will match /hello/sergio, /hello/kattya and /hello/whatever.
Then in our code we use the params hash to access the value of that parameter using the name of the parameter.
Where does params come from? Its created by Sinatra in the DSL, you don’t need to define it.
Now, you can print params.inspect to display all the values

1553363789.name: Rubia sol morena
1553363789.preparation: As a user, I want the recipes to have pictures of each step and the final result, to check how to do them.

1553375939.name: Lomo Saltado
1553375939.preparation:
• 1 cubito de MAGGI – CARNE disuelto en ½ taza de agua
  • 1 cucharada de aceite vegetal
  • 400 gramos de lomo de res picado en tiras
  • 1 cebolla roja cortada en tiras gruesa
  • 2 ajíes amarillos sin pepas y venas, cortado tiras delgadas
  • 2 cucharadas de ajo molido
  • 3 cucharadas de vinagre blanco
  • 4 cucharadas sillao
  • 1 tomate sin pepas cortado en juliana gruesa
  • 3 ramas de culantro picado finamente
  • Sal y pimienta al gusto
  • 4 tazas de arroz cocido
